descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset contains about 127k news articles along with their respective categories which can be used to evaluate your Tamil text classifier performance. 


### Content

The data is acquired by scrapping the publicly available articles published on [Tamilmurasu.org](http://tamilmurasu.org/), which is a well-known newspaper in Tamil nadu, India. The dataset contains articles from 06/01/2011 - 06/01/2020.

### Acknowledgements

This dataset exists because of [Tamilmurasu.org](http://tamilmurasu.org/). All thanks to them.
title: Tamil News Classification Dataset (Tamilmurasu)
subtitle: 127k Tamil news articles with categories
description:
### Context

This dataset contains about 127k news articles along with their respective categories which can be used to evaluate your Tamil text classifier performance. 


### Content

The data is acquired by scrapping the publicly available articles published on [Tamilmurasu.org](http://tamilmurasu.org/), which is a well-known newspaper in Tamil nadu, India. The dataset contains articles from 06/01/2011 - 06/01/2020.

### Acknowledgements

This dataset exists because of [Tamilmurasu.org](http://tamilmurasu.org/). All thanks to them.
